version_description: Minor improvements to the auto dim display feature.
Minor improvements to the auto dim display feature.
You can now use the Battery app on iPad, in full screen or split screen. If you don't like the built-in alarm sounds, you can now select a song from your music library to use as an alarm instead.
You can now use the Battery app on iPad, in full screen or split screen. If you don't like the built-in alarm sounds, you can now select a song from your music library to use as an alarm instead.

We've added a snooze button to the alarm notification and an 'auto snooze' feature if you only want to hear the alarm for a few seconds at a time. 
For paying customers we have added support for Personal Automation through the Shortcuts app. 
There is a new section in the app where you can find answers to frequently asked questions.

Added option to export the charge history.
Added option to export the charge history.
